name: Shin Chikan no Kiwami: Groper of Glory
name_original: Shin Chikan no Kiwami: Groper of Glory
description:
Shin Chikan no Kiwami: Groper of Glory is a casual game. It was originally released in 2018. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
Shin Chikan no Kiwami: Groper of Glory is available on PC.
